metadata.title: USN-4890-1 -- Linux kernel vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Piotr Krysiuk discovered that the BPF subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly compute a speculative execution limit on pointer arithmetic in some situations. A local attacker could use this to expose sensitive information (kernel memory). (CVE-2020-27171)  Piotr Krysiuk discovered that the BPF subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly apply speculative execution limits on some pointer types. A local attacker could use this to expose sensitive information (kernel memory). (CVE-2020-27170)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4890-1` to fix the vulnerability.
